### W6862-200069 – Road Maintenance and Potable Water Supply Services – Holberg, BC

**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Reference Number**: W6862-200069
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Contract Location**: Holberg Detachment, Comox, BC, Canada
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 12, 2022, 2:00:00 PM (EST)
*   **Contract Category**: SRV

### Tender Description

Canada is seeking offers from Eligible Offerors to supply all labour, supervision, tools, material, equipment, and transportation required to repair and maintain roads and supply potable water at the Holberg Detachment for the Department of National Defence (DND) Real Property Unit (Pacific) Section, CFP Comox, Comox, BC, Canada.

### Tender Requirements

*   Provide all necessary equipment, machinery, tools, materials, and supplies to complete the road maintenance and potable water supply services at the Holberg Detachment
*   Ensure all maintenance and repair work complies with relevant regulations, standards, and guidelines
*   Maintain accurate records of work completed, including documentation of materials used, labour hours, and progress

### Eligibility Requirements

*   Register to do business with the Government of Canada
*   Proven relevant experience in road maintenance and potable water supply services
*   Demonstrated ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender

### Selection Criteria

Submissions will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) reserves the right to conduct discussions with Offerors prior to award.

**Bidder Inquiries:** Anthony, Mitch (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email:** mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Tender Document URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14679313?extsite=MTQ2NzkzMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14679313?extsite=MTQ2NzkzMTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

---

### Disclaimer

By accepting the Contract, the Offeror acknowledges
